question: Which civic body of India has launched the ‘Period room’ initiative, for improving menstrual hygiene of women?
explanation:
The Thane Municipal Corporation has taken a first-of-its-kind step and introduced a ‘period room’ in a toilet block located in the corporation.
One out of the ten stalls of the toilet block has been converted into a ‘period room’ with all required amenities. This step is taken to improve menstrual hygiene by breaking the stigma around the process.
